segments.text: Over in the corner, a boy is attempting quite a daring feat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heâ€™s standing on a small two-step stool, which looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs of the stool are splayed out; I fear it could tip backward any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched upward, reaching into an open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, I can clearly see a large jar labeled 'COOKIE JAR,' filled to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is already in the jar, likely grabbing a handful of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With the other hand, he's holding a plate, like a little conspirator for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how daring he is, climbing so high just for sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, with a singular focus on achieving his sugary goal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't lose his balance and fall, potentially hurting himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a risky maneuver for what seems like a simple cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would warn him about the instability of that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR
